name: Extreme Luxury Driving - Off Road 4x4 Jeep Game 3D
name_original: Extreme Luxury Driving - Off Road 4x4 Jeep Game 3D
description:
To become a good Off road car or jeep driver, all the necessary requirements such as completion of a variety of missions and driving through a number of situations and environments are simulated in the game. This is new type of game and all new luxury cars and jeeps. There is no old heavy truck trailer or army heavy truck cargo. Drive the best cars and jeeps in the world.

Diving in the luxury car and jeep on off road environment is dream from everyone. We provide the best luxury cars and jeep for you. Take control and become the best driver of off road jeeps and cars. Forget the heavy truck trailer and army heavy truck because they are very difficult ti drive.

You have twelve (12) luxury SUV under your control for driving through an area of 20 km maps for you. It is your own choice to select the SUV luxury car among a range of offroad luxury cars. An amazing environment such as a marvelous music, stunning animations, real world physics and a truly & professionally set driving and car control system is set up within these 4x4 luxury SUV vehicles.


The simulation game Offroad 4x4 Luxury Driving provides the driver with three controlling options listed as follows:
Steering wheel
Buttons
Tilting the machine
You can select a driving mechanism of your own choice to drive the car.


Following is given a range of spots and environments that a driver of SUV luxury cars will experience during the journey:
Desert: The vast and magnificent Desert will make the lovers of deserts enthusiastic and excited.
Mountains: The Mountains and the hills provide a great experience to the drivers of the SUV luxury cars.
Valleys: The lush green valleys provide a charming view and beautiful stunning views during the drive.
Winter: The winter season at the hill station is a fabulous and stunning scene.
At the end, it is also part of the task to park the SUV luxury car at earliest to show your parking skills. The parking at a narrow place requires utmost attention and vigilance of the surroundings and the free vicinity. The modern graphics, use of mirrors and realistic behavior of the vehicle will be helpful in your expertise to park the car.

Features:
Off-road 4x4 Luxury Driving with different surroundings
Simulated games nearest to real world games and situations
Wonderful graphics with smooth situation
Compatible with the mobiles and Tablets
Multiple 4X4 off road luxury vehicles
Fantastic environment and situations
Stunning 4X4 off-road luxury vehicles experience
Fun for hours
Amazing 3D graphics.
Smooth Steering, Brakes, Drifting & Lifting
